title: What are your preferred keybindings?
body:
Which do you find most comfortable & which have you seen others use?
I've seen a streamer do 1234 for qwer and function buttons for items (nightblue i think)

http://2015.na.lolesports.com/articles/where-does-flash-go-worlds-edition 
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/keybind-wars-which-key-best-flash
^and that shit again... f for flash, f for korean or d for higher winrate?

replies.body: QWER spells. 123567 items 4 trinket. Flash goes on F.
I have 123Z567 for items, D for flash S for secondary summoner spell, QWER for spells, spacebar for attack move range indicator.
